content:
Given things like @RalfJ's questions here, we likely will want to also make a post somewhere explaining our position, etc. to other maintainers who are working on either Rust backends or things morally equivalent to them (emulators, w/e).

https://github.com/rust-lang/miri/issues/1912
I think this can maybe be a markdown file within the portable-simd repo
Also probably a "for other Rust compiler devs" post too, lmao.
